event.title: sit in bed in a store window at Kingsmills department store in downtown London on the 40th anniversary of the John Lennon-Yoko Ono bed-in yesterday

data.event: Peace message resounds in downtown . Mark Facchin and Jessica Wilkie sit in bed in a store window at Kingsmills department store in downtown London on the 40th anniversary of the John Lennon-Yoko Ono bed-in yesterday.
(MORRIS LAMONT/Sun Media) Walter Nowobranec, out for a daily walk with his two terriers, said the Lennon-Ono message still resonates today.
